name: Reds Revenge
description:
We enter into Red's world we step into his shoes as a monster recapturing his home from adventures who had invaded whilst he was on vacation. Jump, double jump and dash your way through the game. In the current build there is

  • 3 Boss Fights
  • Optional Rooms/Pickups
  • Friendly NPC's
  • Unlock able Abilities

Notes

The game is far from complete at the moment was made in six days for a month long game jam i entered late. I will be patching some bit's that are bugs and currently has no audio.
